page.title: 08RECREATION
page.content: OF THE PEOPLE SURVEYED IN OUR AREA, 49% ARE ENGAGED IN SOME SPORTING ACTIVITY. THIS LOW PROPORTION CAN BE ACCOUNTED FOR BY THE NUMBER OF RETIRED PEOPLE RESIDENT IN THE TOWN. SWIMMING WAS THE MOST POPULAR ACTIVITY UNDERSTANDABLE IN A SEASIDE AREA; HOWEVER HERNE BAY DOES NOT HAVE ITS OWN SWIMMING POOL, THE NEAREST INDOOR POOL BEING 7 MILES AWAY IN CANTERBURY. FOR OVER 1O YEARS RESIDENTS OF HERNE BAY HAVE BEEN CAMPAIGNING FOR ITS OWN INDOOR POOL. FOOTBALL IS THE SECOND MOST POPULAR PARTICIPATORY SPORT AMONGST THOSE SURVEYED. ROLLER SKATING AND ROLLER HOCKEY ARE UNUSUAL BUT POPULAR SPORTS ACTIVITIES AVAILABLE AT THE PIER PAVILION LEISURE COMPLEX. FACILITIES ARE AVAILABLE FOR HOCKEY, CRICKET,FOOTBALL,BOWLS,TENNIS & GOLF. 55% SURVEYED FOUND THESE SATISFACTORY
